contents:
给组件添加defaultExpandAll属性，可以默认展开所有节点

仅限首次渲染Tree时生效，后续添加节点不会默认展开

highlighted.content:
import Tree from 'kpc/components/tree';

<Tree
    defaultExpandAll
    data={{ [
        {
            label: 'First floor-1',
            children: [
                {
                    label: 'Second floor-1.1',
                    children: [
                        {
                            label: 'Third floor-1.1.1'
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            label: 'First floor-2',
            key: '2',
            children: [
                {
                    label: 'Second floor-2.1',
                    children: [
                        {
                            label: 'Third floor-2.1.1',
                            key: '2-1' 
                        },
                        {
                            label: 'Third floor-2.1.2'
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    label: 'Second floor-2.2',
                    disabled: true,
                    children: [
                        {
                            label: 'Third floor-2.2.1'
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    ] }}
/>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;
}

<template>
    <Tree
        defaultExpandAll
        :data="[
            {
                label: 'First floor-1',
                children: [
                    {
                        label: 'Second floor-1.1',
                        children: [
                            {
                                label: 'Third floor-1.1.1'
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                label: 'First floor-2',
                key: '2',
                children: [
                    {
                        label: 'Second floor-2.1',
                        children: [
                            {
                                label: 'Third floor-2.1.1',
                                key: '2-1' 
                            },
                            {
                                label: 'Third floor-2.1.2'
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        label: 'Second floor-2.2',
                        disabled: true,
                        children: [
                            {
                                label: 'Third floor-2.2.1'
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]"
    />
</template>
<script>
import Tree from 'kpc-vue/components/tree';

export default {
    components: {
        Tree
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import Tree from 'kpc-react/components/tree';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <Tree
                defaultExpandAll
                data={[
                    {
                        label: 'First floor-1',
                        children: [
                            {
                                label: 'Second floor-1.1',
                                children: [
                                    {
                                        label: 'Third floor-1.1.1'
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        label: 'First floor-2',
                        key: '2',
                        children: [
                            {
                                label: 'Second floor-2.1',
                                children: [
                                    {
                                        label: 'Third floor-2.1.1',
                                        key: '2-1' 
                                    },
                                    {
                                        label: 'Third floor-2.1.2'
                                    }
                                ]
                            },
                            {
                                label: 'Second floor-2.2',
                                disabled: true,
                                children: [
                                    {
                                        label: 'Third floor-2.2.1'
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]}
            />
        )
    }
}

import {Component} from '@angular/core';

@Component({
    selector: 'app-demo',
    template: `
        <k-tree
            [defaultExpandAll]="true"
            [data]="[
                {
                    label: 'First floor-1',
                    children: [
                        {
                            label: 'Second floor-1.1',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    label: 'Third floor-1.1.1'
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    label: 'First floor-2',
                    key: '2',
                    children: [
                        {
                            label: 'Second floor-2.1',
                            children: [
                                {
                                    label: 'Third floor-2.1.1',
                                    key: '2-1' 
                                },
                                {
                                    label: 'Third floor-2.1.2'
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                        {
                            label: 'Second floor-2.2',
                            disabled: true,
                            children: [
                                {
                                    label: 'Third floor-2.2.1'
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]"
        ></k-tree>
    `,
})
export class AppDemoComponent { }
